featuredResources.title: Accessibility for Everyone
featuredResources.author: Laura Kalbag
featuredResources.description: Laura gives an excellent primer on why accessibility matters, provides context for laws and guidelines, and gives insight on how to integrate accessible design into your process.
featuredResources.alt: Two stacked copies of the book, Accessibility for Everyone.
featuredResources.cta: Learn more about Accessibility for Everyone

featuredResources.title: Introduction to Web Accessibility
featuredResources.author: Michele Williams
featuredResources.description: Understanding how people use their computing devices is vital to understanding the diversity of disability in technology. In this video, Michele explains what “making technology accessible” means.

spotlight.name: Segun Ola
spotlight.description: Segun is a frontend web developer working with Andela Nigeria. They work with Andela partners to build highly interactive and accessible web applications.
